浄化者
重騎兵
スィパーヒー
貴方は最近確かに控えめな振る舞いをしていない-大変頻繁にかつ露骨に[Root.Society.GetName]の力を、隠匿すべきという深慮無しに使用したことで、公然と[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]に背教者だと非難されることになりました！
棄教を非難
背教の烙印
この人物は背教の廉で糾弾されています。が、その主張が事実かどうかはまた別の問題です…
敵を蹴落すため、この[rival_target.GetHerHim]の背教を非難する機会を活用しよう。§Y[rival_target.GetBestName]§!はおそらく無罪だろうが、賢明ならざる主君にはどちらか判断つかないだろう…
貴方は§Y[accused_apostate.GetBestName]§!を§Y[Root.Liege.GetTitle] [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]§!の宮廷に引き出し、[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]が背教者の運命を決定づけます！

After taking statement from multiple witnessess and closely examining [accused_apostate.GetHerHis] every move, you have gathered enough damning evidence to accuse [accused_apostate.GetBestName] of apostasy - [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] has obviously sworn allegiance to [accused_apostate.Society.GetName]! Your [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] are poised and ready to bring [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] to you in chains.

After taking statement from multiple witnessess and closely examining [accused_apostate.GetHerHis] every move, you have managed to gather just enough evidence to accuse [accused_apostate.GetBestName] of apostasy - [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] has been consorting with [accused_apostate.Society.GetName]! Your [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] are poised and ready to bring [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] to you in chains.

While spying on [accused_apostate.GetBestName] you have found numerous heretical trinkets and books. All together you now have enough damning evidence to accuse [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] of apostasy - [accused_apostate.GetSheHeCap] claims to be a devout [accused_apostate.Religion.GetName], but [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] is obviously lying - [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] practices [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionAdherent] in secrecy! Your [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] are poised and ready to bring [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] to you in chains.

After taking statement from a few child witnessess and concerned peasants, you have gathered some evidence pointing towards [accused_apostate.GetBestName] being an apostate - you have a good feeling that [accused_apostate.GetFirstName]'s soul has been tainted by [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]! Your [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] are poised and ready to bring [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] to you in chains.

After taking statement from a few child witnessess and concerned peasants, you have gathered some evidence pointing towards [accused_apostate.GetBestName] being an apostate - you have a good feeling about [accused_apostate.GetFirstName]'s soul being tainted by [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]! Your [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] are poised and ready to bring [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] to you in chains.
Seize [accused_apostate.GetHerHim]! [accused_apostate.GetSheHeCap] will face [Root.Liege.GetTitle] [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]'s justice.
I know who I would rather accuse...

[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]は[Root.GetChamber]にて怒りを爆発させた。[accused_apostate.GetBestName]が鎖に繋がれて[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]達に引きずられている。「我が[Root.GetTitle]、この[accused_apostate.GetManWoman]は、[accused_apostate.Society.GetName]への忠誠を公然と宣言しています![accused_apostate.GetHerHim]をどうなされますか？」

[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]は[Root.GetChamber]にて怒りを爆発させた。[accused_apostate.GetBestName]が鎖に繋がれて[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]達に引きずられている。「我が[Root.GetTitle]、私はこの[accused_apostate.GetManWoman]が[accused_apostate.Society.GetName]と交わっているという反論の余地のない証拠を手に入れました![accused_apostate.GetHerHim]をどうなされますか？」

[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]は[Root.GetChamber]にて怒りを爆発させた。[accused_apostate.GetBestName]が鎖に繋がれて[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]達に引きずられている。「我が[Root.GetTitle]、私たちは[accused_apostate.TrueReligion.GetName]の聖典を読み、[Root.job_spiritual.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]を称賛する行為によって、この背教者を捕らえました！[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]をどうなされますか？」

[Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]は[Root.GetChamber]にて怒りを爆発させた。[accused_apostate.GetBestName]が鎖に繋がれて[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]達に引きずられている。「我が[Root.GetTitle]、多くの農民の子供たちがこの[accused_apostate.GetManWoman]の悪夢に悩まされていると言っております。[accused_apostate.GetSheHe]は明らかに[accused_apostate.GetWarlockWitch]です！[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]をどうなされますか？」

[Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]は[Root.GetChamber]にて怒りを爆発させた。[accused_apostate.GetBestName]が鎖に繋がれて[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]達に引きずられている。「我が[Root.GetTitle]、多くの農民の子供たちがこの[accused_apostate.GetManWoman]の悪夢に悩まされていると言っております。[accused_apostate.GetSheHe]は明らかに[accused_apostate.GetWarlockWitch]です！[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]をどうなされますか？」
棄教者は火あぶりだ！
棄教者を牢獄へ送る
焼印を押せ！
[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]を自由にしてやれ、奴に何ができるというのだ？

Curse that damned [my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName], [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]! [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] and [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] posse of [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural] stormed into my [Root.GetChamber] and cast me in chains, accusing me of apostasy. Now [my_liege.GetBestName] has decided that I should be burned alive!
[accused_apostate.GetDWDevil]よ、我が仇を討て！
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]よ、我が魂を救い給え！

Curse that damned [my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName], [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]! [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] and [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] posse of [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural] stormed into my [Root.GetChamber] and cast me in chains, accusing me of apostasy. Now [my_liege.GetBestName] has decided that I am to rot away in [my_liege.GetHerHis] dungeon!
I will be free, and then you will all pay!

Curse that damned [my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName], [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]! [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] and [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] posse of [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural] stormed into my [Root.GetChamber] and cast me in chains, accusing me of apostasy. Fortunately enough [my_liege.GetBestName] decided that I am to go free - though I will be branded as an apostate.
ある意味、幸運だ

Curse that damned [my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName], [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]! [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] and [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] posse of [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural] stormed into my [Root.GetChamber] and cast me in chains, accusing me of apostasy. Fortunately enough [my_liege.GetBestName] decided that I am to go free - [my_liege.GetFirstName] was evidently convinced of my innocence!
自由に歩ける！

災厄だ!  [Root.Society.GetName] の同胞 [From.GetBestName] が、[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName] とその[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]によって捕らえられた。連中は、杭に縛り付けた [From.GetHerHim] をじっくりと火あぶりにした。

災厄だ! [Root.Society.GetName]の同志[From.GetBestName]は、[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName] と [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]によって捕らえられた![From.GetSheHeCap]は現在、[my_liege.GetTitle] [my_liege.GetFirstName]の牢獄でやつれ果てている...

Disaster! Your fellow member of [Root.Society.GetName], [From.GetBestName], has been caught by [my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName] and [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]! They used hot irons to brand [From.GetFirstName] an apostate, fortunately they spared [From.GetHerHis] life...
私も身を隠さねば……
閉門
開門
あんたの下劣な神々はここではなんの意味もない、[From.GetBestName]!
イスラム教徒
州を改宗
[From.Religion.GetName]の信仰に地域住民を改宗させるために、[From.Society.GetName]からの使者を送る。
州の紋章を§G右クリック§!することで地域宗教を貴方の宗教に改宗できるようにする
[From.GetName]における大多数は[Root.Religion.GetName]の信仰を受け入れています
特使が持参した書簡を読み上げるには、[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]は[FromFrom.Religion.GetName]の信仰を人々が受け入れるようにすることに成功した[From.GetName]に対し使者を送る、とのことだ。

§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!の養育方針を変更します。§Y伝統§!に焦点を当てることで、§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!は後見人の宗教や文化を採用することになります。
親愛なる[Root.GetTitledNameWithNick]、\n\n貴方が率先して[FromFrom.GetFirstName]に遺産のことを教えてくれることは大変歓迎するところです。
[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap]はよく教わるでしょう

贈り物として宝物を一つ提供できる
与える宝物を選択…受け取る人の感謝度合いは宝物の質と重要性によって変わります。

[Actor.GetBestName]は私に[GetArtifactName]という贈り物を送ってきている
あなたは[GetArtifactName]を気の利いた贈り物として受け取ってくれるだろうか？

確かにあなたの優雅な贈り物を受け取りました。なんて立派なものなのでしょう!!

品質
蛮族は最近この地区を略奪しています。農民たちは自ら武装し、彼ら自身の家々を一所懸命に守っています。
蛮族による頻繁かつ残忍な襲撃はこの土地を荒廃させています。
暴れまわる群衆
暴れまわる野蛮人どもはこの州の住民を恐怖に陥らせています。もしこの州が文明人により征服されたならば、奴らは散り散りになるでしょう。
蛮族による略奪
この州は蛮族によって略奪されています。この補正がついている限り、その州を再度略奪することはできません。

魔術による毀損
全ての力には代償が伴うものです。黒魔術はこの人物の身体を損ない、虚弱で病気にかかりやすくなります。
力に代償が伴うことは知っていたが、ここまでとは…
私の身体はゆっくりと蝕まれ、そうと気づいたときには手遅れだった。今や[Root.GetDWDevil]の魔術の巻き髭は私の精神を侵し、私の力と決意を少しづつ食い荒らしている。私は不安感に満たされ、眠ることもできない。

I can feel it, it is inside of me! The mesmerizing voice, the sweet touch of my dark saviour! [Root.GetDWDevil]'s gift, the beautiful magic, is flowing freely through my veins. The sensation is dizzying, radiant, breathtaking. Nothing in the world can stop me now!
[Root.GetDWDevil]! Whisper your wishes in my ear and they shall come true!
黒魔術の利用は肉体を損なわせる。\n
私の身体はゆっくりと蝕まれ、そうと気づいたときには手遅れだった。[Root.GetDWDevil]の魔力を宿した闇が私の口に侵入し、舌に巻き付いたのだ。話そうとしてもうまく言葉にできず、人とのやりとりが厄介になり、しゃべることが面倒になってしまった。
闇の腐食は、私の身体にゆっくりと這いより - それが間近に迫るまで、私は気づきもしなかった。最初に起こった軽く引きずるような片足の痛みは、今では醜い奇形に変わり果てた。痛みを発する、ねじれた足首をなでると、肌の下から闇の脈動が感じられた...

The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Little by little, my spine has curved itself forward, pushing my head down towards the ground. It is as if the dark magic has twisted me away from the heavens so that I am always facing [Root.GetDWDevil].
私の身体はゆっくりと蝕まれ、そうと気づいたときには手遅れだった。最初、自分の顔のしわやしみは闇の活動が多すぎることによる睡眠不足で一時的にできたものだと思っていた。今や鏡に映った自分は自分なのかほとんどわからない。

The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Now the dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my body, sapping my energy and causing all sorts of aches and ailments. I cannot remember the last day when I was not sniveling, coughing or retching.

The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Now the dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my body, sapping my energy and causing all sorts of aches and ailments. No matter how long I sleep, I never feel quite rested.

The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Now the dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my body, sapping all of my energy and strength. I often feel as if I am starving, yet I struggle to keep my food down...

Hmm... A few drops of [GetSelectedIngredient_1] should form a magnificent pattern.
§Y[GetSelectedIngredient_1]§!を使うことにより、水面に望ましい形の文様を生み出せる可能性が高くなります。\n
§Y[GetSelectedIngredient_1]§!が宝物庫から削除されます。\n

この選択は宝物庫に複数の§Y原料§!があるため利用できます。\n \n
自らの前にボウルを置き、湛えた水がぴたりと凪ぐまで待った。整っていく揺らめきが、バラバラだった思考を一つに集約させていく。―その一方で、見えざる何かを作り出そうと、錬金術用の棚から色々取り出していた…すると、水面のきらめきがさざ波立つ。私は、一つ、深く息をついた。

There is something annoyingly pompous in the speech of [fellow_member_target.GetTitledFirstName] – when did [fellow_member_target.GetSheHe] become an expert on [Root.GetHermeticDebateSubject]?\nSighing, I close my hand around the vial in my pocket.
なんとかして気持ちを落ち着け、集中を取り戻さねば！
それなら私が良いものを持っている！
落ち着つくのだ、我が子よ。ちょっとだけ[GetSelectedIngredient_1]を淹れてあげよう。
ぐずるでない、我が子よ。[GetSelectedIngredient_1]を煮出した汁物を作ってあげよう。
静まれ、我が子よ。この[GetSelectedIngredient_1]を煎じた水薬が効くだろう。
静まれ、我が子よ。何か作ってやろう、この…うーむ、[GetSelectedIngredient_1]でな。
Let us talk about this, while I brew something soothing.
I'll make it up to you! Let us share some broth from [GetSelectedIngredient_1].
Oh, friend. You clearly need this [GetSelectedIngredient_1] infused brew of mine.
Well... Would you care for some experiential [GetSelectedIngredient_1] infused beer I've made?
吐き気

Apologized
Cheered Up
Calmed

[GetSelectedIngredient_1]を燃やし、その香りで感覚を満たそうではないか。
私は[GetSelectedIngredient_2]のシチューを作りますよ…！
I'll sleep with a nugget of [GetSelectedIngredient_2] under my pillow.
新しいことを試そう…！
やめたほうがいいな。

最近、いくつか錬金術の材料を手に入れた。ヘルメス協会の一員として、持ち物を整理すべきだろうか...。だが、[GetSelectedIngredient_1]には[GetSelectedIngredient_1_property]かもしれない。

I have recently come into possession of some manner of 'alchemical' ingredients. I am not entirely sure what to make of it! Regardless, the [GetSelectedIngredient_1] [GetSelectedIngredient_1_property].
I have recently come into possession of some manner of alchemical ingredients. While I admit I'm intrigued, the [GetSelectedIngredient_1] [GetSelectedIngredient_1_property].
I am told that I have recently come into possession of 'alchemical ingredients'. While I am not certain what that means, the [GetSelectedIngredient_1] [GetSelectedIngredient_1_property].
[GetSelectedIngredient_1]や[GetSelectedIngredient_2]には使い道がない。
これらは異端染みている！

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]は、[From.GetSheHe]がいかにこの時々容赦のなく苦痛に満ちた人生において美徳を貫き生き抜いてきたのかを教え諭してきた。[FromFrom.GetHerHim]の話を聞いている内に、私はより徳を重ねることによって、自身に平穏がもたらされるのだと学ぶことが出来た。

[GetDemonHuntersEventTitle]
悪霊殺し
The Return of the Slayer

Night has fallen as I contemplate my latest ritual – there has to be more efficient ways of washing blood off one's clothes...?\n'You must be the [Root.GetDWDemon]', a voice sounds behind me. I spin, only to find a sinister young woman, casually raising a wooden stake. Then she shrugs. 'I can't let evil like you just walk around'.

As I retire to my quarters for the night, I am startled by a shadow, suddenly moving. 'It's been a while', a bright voice muses as a woman steps into the light, weapon raised. 'How did you get into my [Root.GetCapitalHolding]?', I demand to know, but my voice betrays my brave act. 'Your guards are sleeping, my [Root.GetLordLady]... Let's finish this'.
The Angry Villagers
The Angry Villagers Return

After having snuck out for a late walk with my pet familiar, I make my way back through the gates of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]. Suddenly, shadows surround me and I'm shoved into a wall. A group of angry villagers, their expressions dark in the light of their torches, has gathered around me. Someone yells: 'burn [Root.GetHerHim]!'

I am moving quietly through the gates into the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] tonight, grateful for my disguise. Specific rituals sometimes require me to blend in amongst the common folk. It's become almost second nature – my [GetDWPartyClothes] would be quite the giveaway!\n'There [Root.GetSheHe] is!' someone yells. 'BURN [Root.GetHerHim]!'
The Demon Hunters
The Return of the Demon Hunters

Having just performed a ritual requiring the full moon, it's past midnight when I sneak back into my quarters. Satisfied, I begin washing the blood off my hands. Behind me, someone clears their throat. 'Not so fast, you evil [Root.GetDWDemon]'. I feel the tip of a sword in my back. Another voice mutters: 'Just kill it, brother'.

In honor of [GetDWRandomDemon], I've just finished a new blood ward on my wall. The flickering candlelight makes the intricate pattern glisten, and I back away to admire my art. Suddenly, two shadows grow on the wall, looming over me... The tallest one says, nonchalantly: 'I told you we'd get another shot, brother'.
The Demon Hunter
The Return of the Demon Hunter

In the middle of one of our more carnal rituals, my fellow [Root.GetSocietyRank] suddenly gasps in surprise: 'Did you invite someone else?' Before I have time to reply, a torch is thrown to the floor, sparks singeing my skin. 'We've become [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s madmen, all of us', a darkly clad figure says. 'Die, you demon!'

I still have nightmares about the mysterious demon hunter I once encountered. These days, while I haven't been covering my tracks, the stench of my foul deeds travels further than ever before... Staring at the ceiling in my room, the moonlight suddenly goes out. Leaning over me is a man, weapon raised. 'We meet again'.
An Affront to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]
Still an Affront to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]

I'm not sure what my steward was thinking, letting in a group of holy knights to our [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. They know. Everyone knows! What I am, what I can do... When night falls, I'm not surprised to find myself backed into a dark alley, surrounded by them. 'All [GetDWDemons] must die...!', they cry, riling each other up.

Out surveying my lands, accompanied by a small entourage of servants, I notice a huge cloud of dust being stirred up on the road up ahead... My servants begin to shout and scramble about, as we see a group of knights charging at us – their banner, clearly that of the demon hunting cohort I barely escaped before...
What is the meaning of this? By [GetDWDevil], I will fight you!
You're stubborn! By [GetDWDevil], I will still fight you!
You have no idea who are you are dealing with...!
You pull out your enchanted dagger and jam it into your leg, where you have engraved the emergency symbol.\n
Your attacker staggers away in shock.\n
Your attackers stagger away in shock.\n
Then again, perhaps you could? For a price?
Let's not be hasty...! We can sort this out, with gold?
Woah, woah... Let's be civilized... You seem like businessmen!
I don't suppose you'd be willing to walk out of here, a rich man?
But I'm a rich [Root.GetDWDemon]! Let's make a deal.
No, w-wait, let's talk about it! Is it money you want?
Oh, come on... N-not again. Let's talk about this!
You two again...! How about we sort this out with money?
H-how about I line your pockets with more gold than you can carry?
I'm still a rich [Root.GetDWDemon]! Let's talk about gold!
W-wait! I can give you names! Track down [other_member_to_blame.GetSocietyRank] [other_member_to_blame.GetFirstName] instead!
You pray to [GetDWDevil] that your personal combat skill will save you.\n
In a moment of desperation, you betray your coven.\nThis will increase suspicion of §Y[other_member_to_blame.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
You reach for your money, attempting to bribe your way out.\n
you getting badly injured\n
you getting killed in personal combat\n
the woman rolling her eyes at you, before killing you\n
them laughing at your offer, before dragging you off to be burnt at the stake\n
the demon hunter ignoring your offer, before killing you slowly\n
them being defeated, leaving you alone for now\n
them accepting your offer, leaving you alone for now\n

One of my hunting parties caught a great white boar today. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] must have sent us this creature, as it took ten men to bring the beast down, and the effect it has had on my soldiers is clearly the boon I have been waiting for. 'Bards are already composing songs, my [Root.GetLordLady]', a captain tells me.

One of my hunting parties caught a great white boar today. I am told it took ten men to bring the beast down, and rumors of the effect it has had on my soldiers is already spreading through court. 'Bards are already composing songs, my [Root.GetLordLady]', a captain tells me. This certainly goes against my expectations...

I am not sure whether it is a new-found interest in [envisioned_friend.GetEducationSubject], or if there is something about [envisioned_friend.GetHerHis] [envisioned_friend.GetFriendEnjoyableQuirk], but I am really connecting with [envisioned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]. We have been spending more and more time together, and I think [envisioned_friend.GetSheHe] makes me a better [Root.GetTitle].

I am told of an owl having taken up residence under the roofing of our barracks. One of my advisors suggest I make it a pet. But should not my scrying have revealed the symbol of wisdom to me, if this creature is what it was about? 'Do not dwell on this, [Root.GetMasterMistress]', my steward says, handing me the caged bird.
How did I not foresee this event?
Proud Hunting Parties
